name: THE EXIGENT SEASONS
description:
A quiz from a magazine. A bored friend. His notepad, his dice, and altogether too much time until the rest of your friends arrive:

A difficult era approaches for Valdara, the city-state you govern on the coastal frontier. Fortunately, your advisors and ministers will not permit the destruction of your city. They have considered every possible calamity: even now, with the first crisis bearing down on you, they prepare two avenues by which the emergency might be circumvented.

Will you ensure a great future for your people, or will you die in ignominy? Make your choice now, for The Exigent Seasons are upon you.

This interactive fiction game was written in Inform 7 and compiled in the Glulx story format. It is playable on the web by clicking "Run game" followed by "Play In-Browser"; if you have a Glulx interpreter, you can also download the game using the "Story File" link.
